text: Elephant Song may refer to: *The Elephant Song, a Canadian stage play by Nicolas Billon *Elephant Song (film), a 2014 Canadian film adaptation of the play directed by Charles Binamé and starring Bruce Greenwood and Xavier Dolan *"The Elephant Song" (song), a 1975 song by singer and recording artist Kamahl *Elephant Song (novel), a 1991 novel by Wilbur Smith
title: Elephant Song
